scripts.test:all:
echo '
━━━ TypeScript ━━━' && vitest run && echo '
━━━ Python ━━━' && python -c 'from tests.python.test_teams_payload import test_notification_of_update; test_notification_of_update(); print("✓ test_notification_of_update passed")' && echo '
━━━ Java ━━━' && cd tests/java && mvn test -q && echo '✓ TeamsPayloadTest passed'
